sentence: māso seso gimhānan'ti, bhikkhunā vassikasāṭikacīvaraṃ pariyesitabbaṃ, addhamāso seso gimhānan'ti katvā nivāsetabbaṃ.
māso seso gimhānan'ti, bhikkhunā vassikasāṭikacīvaraṃ pariyesitabbaṃ, addhamāso seso gimhānan'ti katvā nivāsetabbaṃ.

grammar: masc instr sg of bhikkhu, from bhikkhati

grammar: nt nom sg of vassikasāṭikacīvara, comp
meaning: robe-cloth for rain's cloth, cloth for a rainsuit

māso seso gimhānan'ti, bhikkhunā vassikasāṭikacīvaraṃ pariyesitabbaṃ, addhamāso seso gimhānan'ti katvā nivāsetabbaṃ.
meaning: should be worn; can be put on

sentence: māso seso gimhānan'ti, bhikkhunā vassikasāṭikacīvaraṃ pariyesitabbaṃ, addhamāso seso gimhānan'ti katvā nivāsetabbaṃ.
pali_1: "One month is left of the hot season," (then) by a monk the robe-cloth for the rain's cloth can be sought . "A half month is left of the hot season," (then) having made (it), (it) can be worn.

sentence: orena ce māso seso gimhānan'ti vassikasāṭikacīvaraṃ pariyeseyya, oren'addhamāso seso gimhānan'ti katvā nivāseyya, nissaggiyaṃ pācittiyaṃ.
orena ce māso seso gimhānan'ti vassikasāṭikacīvaraṃ pariyeseyya, oren'addhamāso seso gimhānan'ti katvā nivāseyya, nissaggiyaṃ pācittiyaṃ.

orena ce māso seso gimhānan'ti vassikasāṭikacīvaraṃ pariyeseyya, oren'addhamāso seso gimhānan'ti katvā nivāseyya, nissaggiyaṃ pācittiyaṃ.
meaning: offence requiring confession, offence involving expiation

sentence: orena ce māso seso gimhānan'ti vassikasāṭikacīvaraṃ pariyeseyya, oren'addhamāso seso gimhānan'ti katvā nivāseyya, nissaggiyaṃ pācittiyaṃ.
pali_1: If sooner (than) "One month is left of the hot season," should he seek robe-cloth for the rain's bathing-cloth, (if) sooner than "A half month is left of the hot season," having made (it), should he wear (it), this is an offence requiring relinquishment and confession.
